title: Mathematics Learning Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing the Pygmalion Effect

context.additional_context: Microlearning content optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning environments. Emphasizes enhancing real-life problem-solving skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Trainers’ positive expectancy expressions improve learners’ math problem-solving performance by 20% or more.
Learners improve their self-esteem scores, measured via self-efficacy surveys, by 15 points or more compared to pre-course levels.
Learners identify and implement three or more trainer-learner interaction strategies based on the Pygmalion effect principle.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
